metadata.title: Dell XPS 9370 Laptop, 13.3in UHD (3840 x 2160) InfinityEdge Touch Display, 8th Gen Intel Core i7-8550U, 16GB RAM, 512 GB SSD, Fingerprint Reader, Windows 10, Silver (Renewed)
features: Intel Core 8th Generation i7-8550U Processor (Quad Core, up to 4.0 GHz, 8M Cache)
13.3'' 4K Ultra HD (3840 x 2160) InfinityEdge Touch display | Intel UHD Graphics 620
16GB LPDDR3 2133MHz Memory | 512GB PCIe Solid State Drive
Widescreen HD (720p) webcam, Windows Hello compliant | Power button integrated fingerprint reader
Killer 1435 WiFi 802.11ac 2x2 with Bluetooth | Windows 10 Home 64 bit
description: Best of Innovation. Better for the planet. Tide-turning technology: CES recognized the XPS 13 9370 as a 2018 Innovation Awards Honoree in the Computer Hardware and Components category. Dell was also honored to receive a 2018 CES "Best of Innovation" Award in the category of Eco-design and Sustainable Technologies for our Recycled Ocean Plastics Packaging on the silver XPS 13 laptop.
Intel Core 8th Generation i7-8550U Processor (Quad Core, up to 4.0 GHz, 8M Cache)
13.3'' 4K Ultra HD (3840 x 2160) InfinityEdge touch display
Stereo speakers professionally tuned with Waves MaxxAudio Pro
Widescreen HD (720p) webcam with 4 array digital microphones; Windows Hello compliant infrared camera
Full size, backlit chiclet keyboard; Fingerprint reader integrated into the power button
45W Worldwide AC Adapter & 125V US Power Cord
Platinum Silver with Black carbon fiber palmrest
2x Thunderbolt 3 with PowerShare & DC-In & DisplayPort, 1x USB-C 3.1 with PowerShare, DC-In & DisplayPort, 1x card reader, 1x headset jack, 1x Noble lock slot
Starting at 2.67 lbs (1.21Kg) non-touch display, 2.68 lbs (1.21Kg) touch display
